35964.「自分の運命を 呪ってはいけないよ。\n こんな時代でも 希望は必ず あるはずだ:
It's wrong to curse one's own fate. Even in times like
these, one must have hope. Always...

35965.「私どもは フォステイル様と\n 命がけで海を渡って\n このオーグリード大陸へ:
We risked our lives crossing the ocean with Master Fostail to come to Ogreed. All in order to fulfill a certain purpose...
Meeting you in a place like this, for some reason, I would call that fate. Why don't you take a rest for a while?

35966.「この海峡の岩屋の 南西にある\n ランドンフットへ向かい ランドンクイナを\n:
Head southwest of Grotto Strait to Landonfoot, and please combine your strength with Erju to defeat the Apeckalypses.
And then, I want you to bring back the Icebird Feather that the Apeckalypse occasionally drops to me. Sorry, but I'm counting on you.

38893.ランドンクイナは\n氷鳥のはねを 落としていった。\n<auto_br=5000:
The Apeckalypse dropped the Icebird Feather.
obtained the Icebird Feather (Key Item)!

35967.「ああ おかえり。\n どうやら 氷鳥のはねを 手に入れたようだね。:
Ah, welcome back. It looks like you maybe obtained
the Icebird Feather, right.

35968.<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>「おや？ すまな: <attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>Oh yeah? I'm sorry. I appears I was mistaken.

35970.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「ありがとう <:
Thank you, . Your being here truly saved us.
Even Erju appears to be thankful. Please continue to support him so that he can inherit the art of the Sacred Ship.
The last of the Four Sorcerers, Gamilgo, should be living northwest of Landonfoot, in the Wild Settlement.
But I doubt he will open his heart to a human, like Erju. Please take care as well.

35971.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「我らの求めてい:
We heard that you got the Icebird Feather that we have been looking for! Aah, if only we had you in Palkaras Kingdom...!
Thank you so much, human! Now, if you don't mind, please have a good night's rest in this grotto.

35972.「ガミルゴが 人間相手に\n 戦争をしかけようとしていたとは……。\n 事態は思:
To think that Gamilgo wants to start a war against the humans... Things are more serious than I was expecting.
, now is not the time for those of this land to be fighting their fellow people.
I hope Erju can convince Theodore, nevertheless... You, too, please lend him your strength.

35973.「……なに？ 継承の儀を終わらせずに\n レイダメテスに 乗り込むだって？\n<:
...What? You want to sail into Reidametes without having completed all the succession ceremonies after all?
It is true that if you depart from Landon Mountains' Summit, that Erju's Sacred Ship may be able to reach Reidametes...
There is little time left. It is certainly a dangerous gamble, but I have decided to put my faith in Erju.

35974.「確かに ランドン山脈の山頂からなら\n エルジュの破邪舟でも レイダメテスに\:
It is true that if you depart from Landon Mountains' Summit, that Erju's Sacred Ship may be able to reach Reidametes...
There is little time left. It is certainly a dangerous gamble, but I have decided to put my faith in Erju.

35975.「ありがとう <pc>。\n キミの活躍により 私たちは\n レイダメテスの危機:
Thank you, . Because of your actions, it seems that we have escaped the Reidametes crisis.
I will returning to Palkaras Kingdom. Then, the story of you will become my passed down poems. Echoing through the decades and centuries to come...
It's strange, ... I feel a mysterious fate with you. As if we will meet again somewhere.

35976.<attr><feel_sad_lv3><end_attr>「ううっ…… 長い旅:
Uugh... It has been a long journey. At last, we can return to the Palkaras Kingdom!
I am sure the people of my homeland are eagerly awaiting Master Fostail's return... We must make preparations to return home as soon as possible!
However, before that, let us entertain the one who kindly brought our Icebird Feather-our benefactor, . Well...
